alert.note: Alert for Lake Mead National Recreation Area (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 19 at 2:38AM PDT until March 21 at 6:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON SUNDAY TO 6 PM MONDAY... * WHAT...North winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Arizona, Lake Mead National Recreation Area. In Nevada, Lake Mead National Recreation Area. * WHEN...From noon Sunday to 6 PM Monday. * IMPACTS...Strong winds will create dangerous boating conditions on area lakes during the advisory period. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Operators of small craft are urged to postpone their outings during the advisory period. If you do venture out onto the lakes...avoid the open water and stay close to shore or in protected coves and inlets. Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
